@pietern :( That is unfortunate. Thanks for doing the research though! Would it be possible to
1. Once the proc group is initialized, change some flag in the init file.
2. When initializing proc group with file, if the file exists and says that the init is already done (from 1), then 
    1. rank 0 truncates it / clears it.
    2. other ranks enter a read-sleep loop until it reads a valid file.
